hero.title: Rooftop dining with a 360° Baku skyline view
hero.desc: RoofTop Lounge combines panoramic views of downtown Baku and the Caspian Sea with curated cuisine and a calm lounge atmosphere.
hero.addrLine1: City center terrace with boulevard views
hero.rightDesc: From business lunch to sunset cocktails — bespoke experiences above Baku.
hero.rightNote: Private lounges and 360° terrace zones for groups or occasions.

experience.title: A rooftop perspective on Baku
experience.desc: Overlooking downtown Baku and the Caspian Sea, RoofTop Lounge is designed for business lunches, sunset cocktails and late-night lounge evenings.

cards.title: Panoramic views
cards.text: Open-air terrace with unobstructed views of the boulevard, skyline and the sea.

cards.title: Curated cuisine
cards.text: From business lunch to late-night cocktails – Georgian, local and European dishes in a refined setting.

cards.title: City lounge atmosphere
cards.text: Minimal design, warm lighting and balanced music for both gatherings and intimate dinners.

menu.title: RoofTop highlights
menu.description: Prices are in AZN. Please confirm details and allergens with our team.
menu.note: A 10% service charge applies to every bill.

gurcu-metbexi.name: Xəngəl seti 2 nəfərlik

gallery.title: RoofTop highlights
gallery.desc: A look at the terrace, dining room and curated dishes from RoofTop Lounge.

about.title: The RoofTop Lounge story
about.p1: RoofTop Lounge is a rooftop restaurant and lounge located in the heart of Baku. It brings together an open-air terrace, classic architecture and a modern dining experience.
about.p2: Our menu blends Georgian, local Azerbaijani and European cuisines: from breakfast and business lunch to evening steaks, seafood, vegan options and crafted cocktails.
about.featPhilosophyText: Modern takes on Georgian, local and European recipes.
about.featAtmosText: Warm lighting, balanced music and attentive service.
about.cardText: For reservations, groups or special occasions our team tailors the experience to your format.
about.addrValue: Central Baku rooftop with boulevard and Caspian views

contact.title: Contact & reservations
contact.desc: Call us for table bookings, private events or group reservations.
contact.addr: Central Baku rooftop terrace with panoramic views over the boulevard and the Caspian Sea.

homeAtmos.title: RoofTop lounge mood
homeAtmos.desc: Short clips capture the panoramic terrace, minimalist interior and calm music selections.

testimonials.title: Guests on RoofTop Lounge
testimonials.desc: Premium service, calm music and a 360° Baku skyline – highlights from our reviews.

list.name: Business lunch guest
list.text: Ideal for a business lunch: attentive service, flexible timing and a motivating skyline.

list.name: City resident
list.text: Sunset cocktails with calm music feel like a rooftop escape to another city.

list.name: Travel blogger
list.text: The cuisine and service set a new benchmark for Baku’s lounge scene.
